features: Micro-seam allowance (1.6 mm) reduces bulk and weight
Laminated construction eliminates bulk and stiffness
GORE-TEX three-layer construction delivers complete weather protection
Gusseted underarms for mobility and comfort
Adjustable hood with front brim for full weather protection
WaterTight™ full separating two-way front zip hidden under placket
Double kick pleat in hem allows back panel to fit over a bike seat
Two hand pockets with WaterTight™ zippers
Note: Our WaterTight™ zippers are highly water resistant, but not waterproof. We do not recommend keeping items in your pockets that may be damaged by moisture
N42p GORE-TEX Fabric with 3L Tricot technology
